description: This table contains the liver score history for a transplant episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CURRENT_SCORE
columns.description: The most advantageous active liver score. After 6/28/2022 exceptions will not be included due to changes in the OPTN liver allocation policy.

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status, when it is the most advantageous active liver score. After 6/28/2022 exceptions will not be included due to changes in the OPTN liver allocation policy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


One A


One B

columns.name: CURRENT_SCORE_TYPE
columns.description: The type of liver score that this line represents. That is, "MELD", "PELD" or "STATUS"

columns.name: CURRENT_EXCEPTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The exception for this line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CURRENT_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the associated score.

columns.name: CURRENT_END_DATE
columns.description: Expiration date of the associated score.

columns.name: CUR_EXCEPTION_OTHER
columns.description: The other exception for the meld score.

columns.name: SCORE_HISTORY_LINE
columns.description: Line in the HSB 30400 related group corresponding to this line in score history
